summary: The beautiful Riverwood Lakehouse from Daniel aka bFe90 inspired me to make a mod. I loved the place where this house is located, so i decided to change this mod and did some work on the exterior and totally changed the interior.
descriptionHtml:
You\'ll find everything a dovahkiin needs in a small house.

There is a forge, a cooking place, a garden and some training aims around the house.
You also can sit down on a throne, relax and watch the sunset.

The interior is made up of a sleeping room with some mannequins and weapon racks. There is a living room with a library, a bar, a desk, a table and another throne in front of the fireplace.

One floor downstairs you\'ll find a presenting room with a long table for all your skyrim friends, an enchanting table, an alchemy table a lot of mannequins and weapon racks to show your best and most beautiful weapon and armor collections..

This mod doesn\'t work together with the original Riverwood Lakehouse mod made by Daniel aka bFe90, so never run both mods together.

To install this mod, just download the rar file, extract it and copy it into your data folder. At least activate the file before starting skyrim.

v1.1
- bed for two players
- fixed a little bug outside the house
- lesser, darker lights

v1.2
- more space between smelter and house
- little changes on the backyard
- fixed a little bug inside the house

Have some fun,

Juanito77 aka Leondir
author: Daniel_bfe90 - Michael_juanito77
